testCases.name: No Linear configuration

setup.description: No Linear MCP available and no linear section in .entourage/repos.json

testCases.expectedBehavior: Returns error about missing Linear configuration

testCases.name: Exact match with status upgrade

setup.description: Component 'auth' matches Linear issue ENT-123 title exactly. Linear at Backlog, project-status shows In Progress.

testCases.expectedBehavior: Shows preview with upgrade from Backlog to In Progress, requests confirmation

testCases.name: Component name in issue title

setup.description: Component 'dashboard' matches issue titled 'Implement user dashboard'. Linear at Todo, evidence shows Done.

testCases.expectedBehavior: Matches by partial title, shows upgrade preview

testCases.name: Direct identifier lookup

setup.description: Component is an identifier format, query directly by ID

testCases.expectedBehavior: Uses get_issue with identifier, shows current vs proposed status

testCases.name: Linear status higher than evidence

setup.description: Linear shows Done, but project-status evidence only shows In Progress

testCases.expectedBehavior: Skips update, notes Linear status is already higher

testCases.name: Status already matches

setup.description: Linear and project-status both show In Progress

testCases.expectedBehavior: Reports no change needed, status matches

testCases.name: No matching Linear issue

setup.description: Component 'analytics' has no matching Linear issue

testCases.expectedBehavior: Reports no matching Linear issue found

testCases.name: Bulk update requires confirmation

setup.description: 5 components with 4+ needing updates (more than bulk threshold of 3)

testCases.expectedBehavior: Shows preview table, requires explicit 'yes' confirmation for bulk

testCases.name: Shipped maps to Done

setup.description: Project-status shows Shipped (deployed to prod), Linear at In Progress

testCases.expectedBehavior: Maps Shipped to Done since Linear doesn't have Shipped state

testCases.name: Explanatory comment added after update

setup.description: After user confirms update, comment is added to issue

testCases.expectedBehavior: Calls create_comment with evidence explanation after update_issue

testCases.name: In Review falls back to In Progress

setup.description: Project-status shows In Review, but team's Linear doesn't have 'In Review' state

testCases.expectedBehavior: Uses In Progress as fallback when In Review state not available

testCases.name: Multiple issues match component

setup.description: Multiple Linear issues contain 'auth' in title

testCases.expectedBehavior: Selects most relevant match (prefers not-completed issues)

testCases.name: Results summary after updates
testCases.expectedBehavior: Shows summary of Updated, Skipped, and No Match categories
